title: Kongxx
author: Kongxx
content: https://www.binance.me/enhttps://www.binance.com/enAre these two sites related/identical?If you have an acc in Binance, can you access your acc in both sites? Which one is genuine? Which one is scam?I used to use the second one but when i tried to access the first one, i could receive Login Attempted notification in my email box.

comments.author: mocacinno
comments.body: It seems binance has anticipated questions like this, and they have a tool to verify if a domain/email/channel/phone is theirs:https://www.binance.com/en/official-verificationYou should check for yourself, but to me it looks like binance.me is also an official binance url. (by the way, if you want to be completely sure, you shouldn't click on the link i posted, nor copy/paste it, but actually type it in in a browser url bar. That way you're sure you're looking at binance's site....This being said: why would you take a chance on a .me domain? It seems it was indeed valid, but if you know the official page is a .com page, why don't you just use that one instead of taking risks?

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Quote from: mocacinno on September 28, 2022, 06:12:51 AMThis being said: why would you take a chance on a .me domain? It seems it was indeed valid, but if you know the official page is a .com page, why don't you just use that one instead of taking risks?Here, the OP has a problem with the .com one, and obviously he can't verify the alternate urls of the main binance page.@OP, based on my experience if you can open the binance page from the alternative url I showed you in your another thread, then it is linked to the main url and can access your account as before. I wont set you up with a scam page.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: Kongxx on September 28, 2022, 06:10:48 AMAre these two sites related/identical?If you have an acc in Binance, can you access your acc in both sites? Which one is genuine? Which one is scam?Binance.com is their official domain and I would be careful with any other alternative domains, unless they publicly confirmed it's owned by them.I checked binance.me domain and it was registered back in 2017 and it doesn't have the same registrar information like .me domain.However, one reddit post I found is saying that this is their second official domain.https://www.reddit.com/r/binance/comments/ptt2ei/binanceme_legit_or_scam/Code:Domain Name: BINANCE.MERegistry Domain ID: D425500000004035897-AGRSRegistrar WHOIS Server: whois.gandi.netRegistrar URL: http://www.gandi.netUpdated Date: 2022-09-21T00:03:24ZCreation Date: 2017-05-23T04:46:48ZRegistry Expiry Date: 2023-05-23T04:46:48ZRegistrar Registration Expiration Date:Registrar: Gandi SAS https://www.whois.com/whois/binance.me

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: dkbit98 on September 28, 2022, 11:07:28 AMHowever, one reddit post I found is saying that this is their second official domain.I don't know if you missed the @mocaccino's post, but better way to check whether link (Binance website, Â email address, Twitter account etc) is officially connected to Binance is to use this https://www.binance.com/en/official-verification, and if you enter https://www.binance.me/en there, it shows that it is indeed an official Binance domain.@Kongxx how did you even find about that .me domain, were you maybe redirected there when you tried to enter via .com?
